item.title: How airflow supports a foil ball without altering weight
item.description: Discover the physics behind suspended objects. Learn how air pressure and force transfer are used to levitate a foil ball in an airstream, demonstrating that the total weight of the system remains unchanged.

item.title: This ladybug can’t resist my pen
item.description: Observe a ladybug's curious attraction to a red ink line.

item.title: The physics of a drone flying in a closed container
item.description: Does a flying drone change the weight of a sealed container? Explore Newton's laws of motion and the principle of conservation of momentum to understand how internal thrust affects total mass.

item.title: Is this the future of invisibility?
item.description: Explore the physics of cloaking technology with this innovative invisibility shield. Learn how lenses and refraction are used to redirect light and create the illusion of an object disappearing before your eyes.

item.title: Melting dry ice in a vice grip
item.description: Can you melt dry ice? At normal air pressure, solid CO2 skips the liquid phase and turns directly into a gas (sublimation). But what happens when you introduce extreme pressure?

item.title: What happens when electrons bond together?
item.description: Dive into the subatomic world of chemistry! This video breaks down the fundamental forces that hold matter together.

item.title: Crazy physics in action
item.description: Prepare to question everything you thought you knew! Watch this compilation of jaw-dropping physics demonstrations.

item.title: The hidden force behind randomness
item.description: The surprising patterns behind random events and learn how hidden forces shape outcomes you thought were unpredictable.

item.title: Bubbles do math better than you think
item.description: Discover how bubbles naturally form patterns that follow surprising mathematical rules, showing the hidden math in everyday science.

item.title: The weird world of zero-g vortices
item.description: Explore the curious physics of vortices in zero gravity and see how fluids twist and turn in ways you wouldn’t expect.

item.title: The strangest magnet reaction ever
item.description: An unusual magnetic reaction that defies expectations. See how materials and forces interact in the strangest ways!

item.title: The odd physics behind soda on ice
item.description: Discover the surprising physics of soda on ice. Watch how temperature, bubbles, and surface tension create unexpected effects!

item.title: The camera that can see through walls
item.description: Explore the science behind a camera capable of detecting objects hidden behind walls.

item.title: Can a fist break frozen steel?
item.description: See what happens when extreme cold meets raw force. This experiment tests whether a frozen steel bar can be broken with just a punch.

item.title: Light trapped inside a stream of water
item.description: Watch how light bends and flows inside a moving stream of water. This experiment reveals the fascinating ways light can be guided and contained.

item.title: The most valuable material didn’t even come from earth �� #science #space #discovery #astronomy #materials #cosmos #fblifestyle #reels
item.description: We explore a material more precious than gold that didn’t originate on our planet.

item.title: What happens when you drop Mentos in Coke… in a vacuum?
item.description: We know the classic soda geyser, but what happens when we drop Mentos into Coke in a vacuum chamber? Watch the reaction unfold in a completely different environment!

item.title: What if a single grain of sand hit Earth at light speed?
item.description: Imagine the energy of a single speck traveling at the speed of light. This experiment breaks down the physics behind extreme collisions, revealing just how powerful even the tiniest object can be in theory.
